text: i am a engineering student and i have to do a lot of numerical processing, plots, simulations etc.
The tool that i use currently is Matlab.
I use it in my university computers for most of my assignments.
However, i want to know what are the free options available.
i have done some research and many have said that python is a worthy replacement for matlab in various scenarios.
i want to know how to do all this with python.
i am using a mac so how do i install the different python packages.
is it really a viable alternative?
what are the things i can and cannot do using this python setup?
